summary: This module provides a function to test if a file has reached its end (EOF). It contains a simple wrapper function sm_io_eof that validates the file pointer and then calls the sm_eof macro to determine if the file is at EOF.

logs.reason: Logs an error when the file pointer does not match the expected SmFileMagic type. This likely happens when an invalid or corrupted file pointer is passed to the function.
logs.resolution: Check the validity of file pointers before passing them to sm_io_eof. Make sure files are properly opened and not already closed.
